string.text:
Simple tin can, which can be found very often in the Zone. It is better not to collect and not anger the old merchant from outskirt.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:

%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[default] Garbage

A blister of green tablets that sober the body well and even invigorate a little. 
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] Medicament 

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] Good sobering effect 

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] Slight decrease in sleepiness

A large enough package of bolts, contains about 25 pieces. The usual, unremarkable bolts that stalkers use to detect anomalies.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:

%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[default] Common object

Fired shell casing, many stalkers use them to detect anomalies.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:

%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[default] Common object

Psy-dogs are distinguished by powerful mental abilities, in particular, by the generation of illusions and the impact on the brain of other creatures, and it is safe to say that these forces originate in their brains. Interestingly, each mutant with such Psy-wave-related abilities has a similar brain structure. Scientists will pay generously for samples of such tissues. The brain has the smell of sour vegetables.
 
%c[default]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] Mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] High value

A mixture of potasium permanganate and an alcohol-containing substance. Suitable for external deactivation of objects by physically removing radioactive substances. It is impossible to deactivate unsealed or unpressurized items.
 
%c[default]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Allows you to deactivate items
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Self-made item

A bottle of red wine Merlot. Among the top ten international varieties and is the second most popular after the famous Cabernet Sauvignon. Natural red wine increases the body's resistance to viral, electromagnetic and radiation effects, contains a natural antioxidant that protects against radiation, and due to the presence of resveratrol, it can prevent some damage caused by it, due to the presence of rubidium in it, accelerates the removal of radioactive cesium from the body. In the 70–80s of the last century, natural red wines introduced into the ration of nuclear submarine crews and personnel serving radioactive installations. The Chernobyl tragedy forced hypocrisy and propaganda to retreat in the struggle for a "sober lifestyle." Just the day after the accident, huge stocks of dry red wine were delivered to Kiev.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Drink
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Stimulant
%c[ui_red] • %c[default]Strong alcohol
%c[ui_red] • %c[default]Moderate increase in sleepiness

Spare parts of old weapons. The wooden elements are not to say that they are in good condition, for sure only beginners may be interested in buying these. Metal elements are also in relatively good condition.

Spare parts of automatic weapons: springs, strikers, receiver boxes, stocks, clips and much more. The components are in relatively good condition with the exception of wooden parts.

A set of improvised tools and industrial high-tech tools of the highest quality for cutting and trimming. Allow to cut and disassemble any suit or helmet.

%c[0,155,155,155] • %c[default]Technological devices
%c[0,255,1,1] • %c[0,230,230,230]Allows you to work withHigh-tech items

A set of factory tools and improvised tools for cutting and trimming. Allow to disassemble any medium-tech suit, as well as gas masks.

A set of improvised tools and rough tools for disassembly. Allows you to disassemble the guns in any form, the tools are not enough for greater manufacturability.

Factory set of tools and tools for disassembling. Allows you to disassemble almost everything except 7.92 caliber rifles and some sniper rifles.

%c[0,155,155,155] • %c[default]Technological devices
%c[0,255,1,1] • %c[0,230,230,230]allow to disassemble and maintain: pistols, submachine-guns, shotguns

A set of high-quality industrial tools and tools for disassembly. Allows you to disassemble absolutely any weapon.

The armored plate of the “SEVA” model, cut out of the suit. Made by technology of one of the Kiev defense research institutes. Able to stop a pistol bullet and absorb damage from edged weapons. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[default]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Armor repair(+8%)

Ceramic-composite panel model «ESAPI». Provides protection class 4. Made of high quality composite materials and ceramics, protective substances were applied on top of the element. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[default]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Armor repair(+13%)

The armor "SAPI" of lightweight combined armor. Provides protection class 3. Made of high quality materials. On the front side of the armored panels, on top of the ceramic layer, there is a protective layer designed to increase the operational survivability of the armored panel. Outside the panel is covered with nylon. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[default]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Armor repair(+10%)

Handicraft armor of Kevlar and aramid. Provides class 2 protection. Made in the Zone from materials brought from the perimeter. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[default]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Armor repair(+7%)

Homemade armored element from Kevlar and thick fabric. Provides class 1 protection. Made in the Zone from materials brought from the perimeter.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:

%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[default]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Armor repair(+5%)

Native heavy armor "Granite-4M" of composite materials and ceramics. Provides class 5 protection. Custom-made perimeter-guarded military units for suits. Can be used as a repair material.

A PCB is a dielectric plate, on the surface and/or in the volume of which electrically conductive electronic circuits are formed. The printed circuit board is designed for the electrical and mechanical connection of various electronic components. The electronic components on the printed circuit board are connected by their leads to the elements of the conductive pattern, usually by soldering.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[default]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Helmets repair(+3%)

Specialized kit for replacing the servo of the exoskeleton in the field. Includes required materials as well as calibration tools. Can only be used to replace the servo.

The self-made cartridge of the 12th caliber, equipped with pellets with a diameter of 6 mm. At close distances, it has a huge slaughter and stopping action. Designed for firing of smooth-bore weapons and shotguns.

It is a part of an explosive device containing an explosive charge that is more sensitive to external influences than a high explosive of a main charge. The detonator is designed to reliably excite the explosion of the main charge of an artillery shell, mines, bombs, missile warheads, torpedoes, as well as a subversive charge. 
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Technological item

Old razor blades, very sharp. Can be used for cutting fabrics and other materials.

Stainless scissors, sharpened. They cut well, sharpened.

Set of old shaving blades and sharpened, stainless scissors.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Technological items
Scissors, blades and a swiss knife

Set of old shaving blades and sharpened, stainless scissors, as well as multifunctional Swiss knife. An excellent set to disassemble any outfit.

Set of swiss knife and cutlery. Good for disassembling something small.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Technological items

Flash card with a written malware software - xHack version 1.0. It is known in narrow circles that it's able to hack any user accounts and accounts on the victim device, redirecting all found resources to the specified addresses. It can hack any kind of digital device, regardless of the installed operating system.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Hacking accounts and personal files
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[default]Attention:%c[0,170,170,170]USING THIS SOFTWARE IS ILLEGAL

Heavy metal container in which equipment or provisions can be transported. Heavy enough to carry alone.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Technological item 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Used to supply local traders

One of the edible species of mushrooms growing on the territory of the Zone and beyond. It doesn't have any mutations. Edible after long boiling or frying, slightly fonit. Often used by local drug addicts, for the manufacture of tranquilizers and potent painkillers. It grows most often in swampy and dark areas. It is recommended to refrain from the use of mushrooms collected in the Zone, as they accumulate heavy metals, radionuclides and other harmful substances.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Raw food
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[default]Low quality food
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Contaminated power supply
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Can be used in medicine

Big amanita, which can be found within the Zone. Unlike its counterparts, it is much more poisonous due to the fact that it contains many harmful and radioactive substances. Can be used for the preparation of medicaments. It is recommended to refrain from the use of mushrooms collected in the Zone, as they accumulate heavy metals, radionuclides and other harmful substances.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Raw food
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[default]Low quality food
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[default] can be cooked
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Can be used in medicine
%c[ui_red] • %c[default] poisonous food

Large boiled mushroom. Edible, tastes good after a long cooking period. Often used by local gourmets as an alternative source of food, despite the fact that it is still slightly fonit. It grows most often in swampy and dark areas. It is recommended to refrain from the use of mushrooms collected in the Zone, as they accumulate heavy metals, radionuclides and other harmful substances.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Boiled food
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Contaminated food
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Can be used in medicine

Common crow Egg. It is a very high-calorie product, it satisfies hunger, slightly improves health and slightly reduces the dose of radiation. In connection with the absence of chickens and other egg bearing creatures in the Zone, is a local delicacy.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Food
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Raw food

>A boiled crow egg, a very high-calorie product, satisfies hunger, slightly improves health and slightly reduces the dose of radiation. In connection with the absence of chickens and other egg bearing creatures in the Zone, is a local delicacy.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Food
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Clean food

The dosimeter "Pripyat" RKS-20.03 is an electronic measuring instrument manufactured by the USSR. Designed for individual and collective use when measuring the equivalent dose rate of background ionizing radiation, beta-radiation flux density, specific activity in liquids and solids. Developed in 1980-1990-ies at the Kiev plant. The best for its time and most popular household dosimeter, starting from the 1990s of the last century to the present day inclusive. It was every employee of Chernobyl's friend. Measures radiation power in Roentgen per hour. The maximum threshold is 10000?R/h. This level of radiation is considered fatal to a person who is unprotected.
 
%c[default]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Technological device
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Power: Battery 9V (CR-9V)

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Low energy consumption

The laptop stores the data of the anomaly research on the Agroprom. 
Problem 3.7 has not been completed, several places have been marked, some have been crossed off, others are apparently not yet investigated. The coordinates where the samples still need to be collected are also indicated. 
 
Unreaded Messages: 
%c[0,225,225,225] • %c[default]Dubrov, I found something here... I got some more samples, I wrote it all down, you need to see it. 
%c[0,225,225,225] • %c[default]Dubrov, get in touch. 
%c[default] 
CHARACTERISTICS:
%c[default] • %c[default]Technical device
%c[default] • %c[default]Personal item

PDA of the dead stalker, who helped candidate Pirogov to place the prototypes in the anomalies in the dump. The PDA left a map with tags in key locations.
 
%c[default]CHARACTERISTICS:
%c[0,225,225,225] • %c[default]Unexplored artefact
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Personal item

PDA of the famous Gunslinger. According to the content, you can understand that he almost did not have time to use it. From the preserved information, only the transition plan to the Chernobyl nuclear power plant and a detailed map of the Red Forest with a map of anomalies.
 
%c[default]CHARACTERISTICS:
%c[0,225,225,225] • %c[default]Technical device
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Personal item

Papers from lab X-19. Most of the pages are damp, you can't read them. But on the diagrams you can disassemble a map of the area near the radar. And also methods for attaching experimental specimens to trees.
 
%c[default]CHARACTERISTICS:
%c[0,225,225,225] • %c[default]Paper
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Personal item
The memory module of the VNZ "Circle"

Module removed from the equipment of the station of tilt and return probing "Circle". Contains territory spectrogram near the station with detailed map of anomalies.
 
%c[default]CHARACTERISTICS:
%c[0,225,225,225] • %c[default]Technical device
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Personal item

A personal letter of appreciation acknowledging your merits to science, personally signed by Academician Skabinsky. As well as a recommendation to accept the submitter of this paper as a candidate for the Chernobyl Zonal Institute.
 
%c[default]CHARACTERISTICS:
%c[0,225,225,225] • %c[default]Paper
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Personal item
